message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you consider my counteroffer?
